fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use a potion on another player each night.
Attributes:
- When using a potion, you may choose to heal your target, learn their role, or attack them.
- Each choice has a two-night cooldown unless you have the Necronomicon.
- Each cooldown ends when you gain the Necronomicon.
- You are immune to effects that would alter how your targetâ€™s role appears to investigative effects.
- You may receive the Necronomicon on night 3, provided no roles that have priority for it exist and you win the random chance. You also can get it after the current wielder dies.
